item.title: CS 61A
item.description: Self-paced course taken summer ‘22, linked here. Beginner programming course using Python – teaches data abstraction, … Great focus on shortcuts and problem-solving with code; has hints of competitive coding strategies.

item.title: Stream

item.title: Ubuntu 22.04 with UTM
item.description: No easy way to dual boot with the M1 chips – UTM is a software specifically for macOS to run VMs or emulate other machines How to create a new Ubuntu VM: Install the 22.
